template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a wind-turbine farm that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Optimize power generation by analyzing live data to adjust parameters safely, monitoring the results, and reporting performance gains.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise prompt under 40 words for a wind-turbine farm optimization task. The key elements are analyzing live data, adjusting parameters safely, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements.

I need to pack all those requirements into one smooth sentence. Let me start with the core action - optimize power generation. Then incorporate live data analysis, safe parameter adjustments, result monitoring, and finally reporting gains.

The word count is tight, so I'll use economical phrasing like "analyze live data to adjust parameters safely" and "report gains" to keep it under 40 words. The sentence should flow naturally while hitting all the specified points.
